short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Atom Material Icons for Web (GitHub, BitBucket, Gitee, Azure and GitLab)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces file icons in sites such as GitHub, GitLab or BitBucket according to their extensions or associated frameworks/libraries. 

This is a porting of the famous extension Atom Material Icons for JetBrains (https://github.com/mallowigi/a-file-icon-idea), now in your web browser!

Works on:
- GitHub (Repositories, Search and Pull Requests)
- GitLab
- Gitee
- BitBucket
- Azure

13.0.0
- Fix Styling in the GitHub Search 
- Improve performance on repositories with thousands of files, preventing freeze
- Upgrade latest dependencies and icons

12.0.0
- Fix GitHub Code View not replacing icons on the tree
- Fix Folder Icons in GitHub Pull Requests
- Prevent wrong icon replacement in Azure
- Import latest Atom Material Icons
- Fix Icons losing their viewBox, reducing their size

11.0.0

- Setting to hide the Floating Action Button
- Fix display:flex in Github CSS

10.0.0

- Support for Azure
- Fix icon alignment issues

9.0.0 
- Settings popup: 
  - Monochrome mode
  - Custom Icon Size
- Floating Button in the bottom right of the page to quickly toggle features!
